amendment.description: Amendment reduces funds for the Operation and Maintenance Account, Defense-Wide by $6 million and increases funds for upgrades to joint training and training development facilities at Air Force installations by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds for Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide by $6,000,000 and increase funds for Other Procurement, Air Force by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Runyan amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
